dcterms:creator: F. Southey
M. Bowling
B. Larson
C. Piccione
N. Burch
D. Billings
C. Rayner
dcterms:description: A dataset used for opponent modeling in poker, specifically in the context of Leduc Poker, which is a small-sized game with two rounds of betting.
dcterms:title: Leduc Poker

dcterms:creator: N. Brown
A. Lerer
S. Gross
T. Sandholm
dcterms:description: A dataset for Heads-up Flop Hold’em Poker, which is a medium-sized game with a large number of nodes and infosets, used to evaluate deep counterfactual regret minimization.
dcterms:title: Heads-up Flop Hold’em Poker (FHP)

dcterms:creator: N. Brown
T. Sandholm
dcterms:description: A dataset for Heads-up Limit Texas Hold’em, a large-scale game with a significant number of nodes and infosets, used to demonstrate superhuman AI capabilities in multiplayer poker.
dcterms:title: Heads-up Limit Texas Hold’em (HULH)
